## Connection.setShadowDom() method

Changes the connection's shadow block.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setShadowDom(shadowDom: Element | null): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  shadowDom | Element \| null | DOM representation of a block or null. |

**Returns:**

void
